content.raw:
OK, this is working for me on the non-nvidia machine as well. In both cases I’m running Ubuntu 16 but using the Ubuntu 18 container, so that’s pretty nice. I see you just added a script that answers my question above by opening a new terminal in a container based on the image name it was created from, so I tested that too and it also worked well. Thanks!

I’m going to go ahead and approve. I assume we will wait for Brian to test and approve and then merge this after we have completed the other pending merge requests.
content.html:
OK, this is working for me on the non-nvidia machine as well. In both cases I’m running Ubuntu 16 but using the Ubuntu 18 container, so that’s pretty nice. I see you just added a script that answers my question above by opening a new terminal in a container based on the image name it was created from, so I tested that too and it also worked well. Thanks!

I’m going to go ahead and approve. I assume we will wait for Brian to test and approve and then merge this after we have completed the other pending merge requests.
